hero.description: Passionate about technology and solving problems through code.

items.interest: Interest in frontend and mobile development.
items.search: Looking for a new opportunity as a developer.

timeline.2023: Started the integrated technical course in Informatics at IFCE, where I learned the fundamentals of programming logic, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It was my first practical contact with web development.
timeline.2024: Deepened my studies in React.js and TypeScript, creating personal projects to consolidate learning. I also began to better understand backend integration.
timeline.2025: Performed my first freelance job, developing login and registration screens with authentication via Supabase, using Next.js. Continued studying clean code, project architecture, and best practices.
timeline.current: I continue to evolve with my own projects and strengthen my technical base while seeking my first professional opportunity as a developer.
